data.name: Stealth Kart
data.detailed_description:
In Stealth Kart, we mix Real-Time Tactics and Fun Racing. Sneak past the policemen's eyes or get into hot pursuits.
The green friend has a fast car and needs to get to the goal. One friendly kid has a ramp car, allowing crazy jumps. Another kid has his dad's donut food truck, avoiding suspicion by selling donuts.

  • Real-Time Tactics meets Racing gameplay: Pick up and play, beat a level in minutes
  • Three playable characters, all with unique abilities
  • Local coop option: old-school tactical teamwork
  • Jump over ramps, drive the ramp car, swim, distract policemen with donuts
  • Cameraderie between a green alien and friendly kids
  • Longtime motivation: Replay levels with different approaches for medals
  • Choose your playstyle: Hot pursuits! Or stealthy sneaking. Or making the policemen swim.

data.short_description: Stealth Kart is Racing plus Real-Time Tactics. Enjoy the classic thrill of sneaking past enemies in pick-up-and-play-friendly small levels. Or race past everyone. Play alone, or coordinate special cars alone, or play coop.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
